website_summaries.verdict: If there is one major takeaway about the Cruzer Psyche, it would have to be its amazing level of comfort. That said, outside comfiness, the Evolv piece in question also deserves accolades in the areas of underfoot security and aesthetics.This ultra-lightweight shoe, however, might not be the most supportive approach tool out there. Nonetheless, the Cruzer Psyche is yet another outstanding Evolv piece, what with its stunning design and equally as endearing trail-to-rock qualities.
pros: The Evolv Cruzer Psyche is a remarkably comfortable approach shoe, says almost everyone who has bought it
According to droves of users, its lightness is truly one of a kind
This approach-centric hiker from Evolv is super tenacious underfoot, based on numerous wearers
Many customers are enthralled by the Cruzer Psyche’s dapper looks
Its packability is one of its selling points, a few patrons claim
An owner is quite impressed with the featured shoe’s incredible breathability
cons: About a handful of approach enthusiasts find the Cruzer Psyche’s support system underwhelming
Its durability could be better, according to a couple of purchasers

customer_reviews.title: Light hiking shoes for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are great hiking shoes. I was looking for something less bulky than my old boots to take on trips. I try to pack carryon only. These are lightweight and small but still sturdy. They have great traction and worked for light hiking and hilly cobblestone streets in Morocco.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe felt like I was walking on stiff cardboard. There's very little support (I have high arches) and the sole was super unforgiving. It may get more comfortable as you go, but I'll never find out. The heel also rubbed so badly I wouldn't have been able to wear low socks. Just not great. Seemed sturdily constructed though, so they have that going for them.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Nicole Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! The memory foam insole is a dream
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! The memory foam insole is a dream. The fabric outer gets dirty at times, but supposedly these can be machine washed? Have yet to try it. I’ve hiked in these and found them to be comfortable all the way through, which is rare for shoes as thin as these. The bottom grips are nice. Easy to slip on.
customer_reviews.author: Miso

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent shoes. I use them for down hikes and scrambles. They are so low profile and so light I can easily stick them into a small day pack or clip them to my harness. They are snug around the ankle and don't let sand and pebbles creep inside the shoe. They are not well-suited for longer hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! These were my hiking shoes for 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these shoes to hike in Yosemite... never broke them in. Perfect fit! These were my hiking shoes for 7 days and they were awesome! Never got a blister and they kept me from slipping on the steep granite trails. I'd recommend these to anyone hiking on rocks/granite! Throw them in the washer when they get dirty. Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanelle Wellhoner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too big
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in size 4 men's (which they say is size 5 women's, but 35.5 EU) and size 5 women's (which they say is size 35 EU) but the men's is smaller than the women's and fits better for me. I have really small feet and considering I am at the very bottom of the size spectrum, if the shoes "run large" then I'm out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: sherbert

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes, loved the fit and feel of them. However, they didn't even last a week as approach shoes with rough rock. The sides are shredded across the widest part of the foot because the rubber doesn't cover far enough to be a real approach shoe. Also, the seem at the bottom of the "evolv" logo split on one and I can stick my finger between the two pieces of fabric. Didn't have much arch and my ankles were acting up after a week, but that's more my ankles than the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great value for wonderful shoe
customer_reviews.text: It took a day off wearing, but these have already stretched a bit and are incredibly comfortable! Great color, quick shipping, and good fit. I'm going to be hiking in Colorado in them in 6 week, and will update if review needs to be changed. Extremely happy with this great vegan product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brin

customer_reviews.title: Great trad shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe for short approaches and multipitch walk-offs. They are really comfortable to wear, stick to rock like mad and fold up flat for easy packing to the top of a route. The toebox is roomy, too roomy for me to feel comfortable climbing beyond 5- in them, but otherwise no complaints. The soles are quite thin, making the shoes feel like slippers. I like this a lot, but others wanting a beefier shoe should probably look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: NWOutdoorGrrl

customer_reviews.title: Evolv approach shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and the fit, they are much more comfortable than I was anticipating can’t wait to break them in. I was really happy with the price as well great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Harnedy

customer_reviews.title: A climbing gym employee's best friend
customer_reviews.text: I work at a rock climbing gym and needed a good shoe for demo-ing to climbers in. These shoes boulder and climb routes well, even little foot chips! My other friend climbs up to V7 in them. Super comfortable to wear all day long, even my boyfriend wants a pair after trying mine on! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: marissa klein

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, was hoping for a bit more of a barefoot feel, but they are really cute and I can wear them all day. The sole does leave marks so watch out if you ever wear them indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie Rey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: gret grip nice fit fantastic rich color only complaint is that the canvas is a bit stiff. Im sure this will break in after serveral wears.
customer_reviews.author: M. LebronDykeman

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 stars but pebbles easily get in shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, great grip, breezed, but small pebbles/sand/grav can easily get into these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are very minimalist but I don't need a lot of shoe. Great on bouldering / scrambling surfaces and enough sole to survive long approaches.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Eide

customer_reviews.title: Sized much smaller, order up!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a women's size 12, which I was very excited to find. Unfortunately when they arrived, they fit like a size 10. I can sometimes do a size 11, but these were extremely small, I couldn't even get my foot in the shoe. I gave a 3 because of the sizing, otherwise the shoe is really cute. Update: I ended up with a men's size 11 in this shoe and it is fabulous! Because the design is fore barefoot wear the men's sizes are not wide and bulky. If you have long narrow feet these shoes are a great fit and extremely stylish and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Duevel

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! Super comfortable and perfect for traveling around and small hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Approach Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love my evolv Cruzers. The soles are super sticky. The shoes are incredibly comfortable and lightweight. I highly recommend this approach shoe for mellow walks to the crag and for around town.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: these r the best shoes ever. the traction on the bottom is great. they are light and comfortable! i think i might order myself another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary T

customer_reviews.title: Love! Great support for my soles
customer_reviews.text: Love! Great support for my soles, sticks to rocks like magic, and the elastic lavender shoelaces just simply make me happy! They fit snug the first 5 minutes, but after the 1st uphill hike they have stretched/conformed to my foot. Con- for fashion- have to be picky with which socks I wear! My stripy smartwools are a bit much with solid purple shoes! (or maybe I just haven't found the perfect matching pair!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: nice looking product, but size matters
customer_reviews.text: ordered size 9, box stated the size 9, but contents were a half size larger than the label on the box, 9.5. shoe might be okay if we had the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it is too bad. Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Weirdly, I have the exact same show in two other colours (and same size) and these are way bigger. Not sure what this is about, but it is too bad. Will be returning. Otherwise a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Mika Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe! Highly recommend for very short approach and camp shoe. Very minimalist, low support, wouldn't do extended hikes with them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite what I was Looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning these because they run a bit small, and I am slightly worried about their construction holding up in rainy season. I think these are probably a great approach shoe, they're comfortable, and I love that they're vegan, but ultimately, I think they just didn't fit what I was looking for, which was more of an everyday shoe with good grip for the rainy season in Guatemala.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Miller

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, short life expectancy. Mine began falling apart very quickly. But I love them! Great rubber.
customer_reviews.author: neutronsoup

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable though, I would not recommend as an approach ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable though, I would not recommend as an approach shoe because they are so flimsy. Also, one lace was much shorter than the other, difficult to tie the short one.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for mild-moderate approaches and or looking fly
customer_reviews.text: I won a pair of these bad ass shoes at a ladies BASE jumping event in Idaho. Since they’ve come into my life I’ve been extremely pleased! I wear them often and enjoy that they are both light weight and grippy. I use them to climb towers often and for light to moderately gnarly approaches. Pay attention to sizing and you should be pleased!
customer_reviews.author: MagicFam

product_meta.title: Evolv Cruzer Psyche Approach Shoe - Women's
product_meta.description: Same great performance, stylish new packaging. The Cruzer Psyche is designed to take you from the crag to the summit.
feature_bullets: Microfiber lined memory foam insole for lasting comfort
